General.Name: Genex Power Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Genex Power Limited develops and commercializes renewable energy generation and storage projects in Australia. The company generates power through hydro, wind, and solar projects. Its flagship project is the Kidston Clean Energy Hub comprising 50MW solar project and the 250MW Kidston Pumped hydro project located in the north Queensland. Genex Power Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Sydney, Australia.
